data.name: Archlord Kristya
data.desc: If you have exactly 4 Fairy monsters in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy monster in your GY; add that target to your hand. Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the GY, place it on top of the Deck, instead.

data.name: Clear Vice Dragon
data.desc: You are unaffected by the effects of "Clear World". If this card attacks an opponent's monster, the ATK of this card becomes twice the ATK of the attack target, during damage calculation only. If this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, you can discard 1 card instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Clear World
data.desc: During each of your End Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card. Each player receives effects, depending on the monster Attributes they control. ● LIGHT: Play with your hand revealed at all times. ● DARK: If you control 2 or more monsters, you cannot declare an attack. ● EARTH: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control; destroy that target. ● WATER: During your End Phase: Discard 1 card. ● FIRE: During your End Phase: Take 1000 damage. ● WIND: You must pay 500 Life Points to activate a Spell Card.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Dark Simorgh
data.desc: While face-up on the field, this card is also WIND-Attribute. You can banish 1 DARK monster and 1 WIND monster from your Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish 1 DARK monster and 1 WIND monster from your hand; Special Summon this card from your Graveyard. Your opponent cannot Set any cards on the field.

data.name: Guardian Eatos
data.desc: If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can send 1 of your Equip Spell Cards equipped to this card to the Graveyard, then target up to 3 monsters in your opponent's Graveyard; banish those targets, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK for each monster banished by this effect, until the end of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Dragons of Legend: The Complete Series

data.name: Ice Queen
data.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. When this face-up card you control is destroyed and sent to your GY: You can target 1 Spell in your GY; add that target to your hand. You must have 3 or more Spellcaster monsters in your GY to activate and to resolve this effect.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Shutendoji
data.desc:
Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Banish 2 Zombie monsters from your GY; draw 1 card.
● Target 1 of your banished Zombie monsters; place that target on the top of your Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack

data.name: Victoria
data.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Dragon-Type monster in your opponent's Graveyard; Special Summon that target to your side of the field. Your opponent cannot target face-up Fairy-Type monsters for attacks, except this one.
